asgn1Election

Class ElectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn1Election.ElectionManager

  • public class ElectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Class to run a seat based election. The class hierarchy from Election provides the definitions and holds the vote collection; this class obtains a list of elections and provides a convenient wrapper of the counting methods for use in GUI applications.

    A command line application is provided in main(String[])

    Author:
    hogan

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Simple command line application - does not control GUI launch. Reads an election list and works through the results one by one

        Parameters:
        args - String[] unused

      • getElectionsFromFile

        public void getElectionsFromFile(java.lang.String srcFile)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 ElectionException,
                                 NumbersException
        Method to load list of elections from file specification
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if srcFile not found
        java.io.IOException - if problems from BufferedReader
        ElectionException - from parseElectionFromLine(String, int)
        NumbersException - from parseElectionFromLine(String, int)

      • manageCount

        public java.lang.String manageCount()
        Wrapper method to manage count of election, reporting results.
        Returns:
        String containing report for all electorates.

      • setElection

        public void setElection(Election elec)
                 throws ElectionException,
                        java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        NumbersException

        Setter for the current election, but one which loads its definitions and votes from the files specified by the election name.

        Throws numerous exceptions propagated up from the Election methods

        Parameters:
        elec - Election to be loaded and set as the current election
        Throws:
        ElectionException - from Election.loadDefs(), Election.loadVotes()
        java.io.IOException - from Election.loadDefs(), Election.loadVotes()
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - from Election.loadDefs(), Election.loadVotes()
        NumbersException - from Election.loadDefs(), Election.loadVotes()
